aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.line1: I specialize in Front-end and Back-end Web development, as well as Mobile development.
aboutMe.line2: In these fields, I can intervene on all types of missions: from simple maintenance to the complete creation of your web and/or mobile application, right through to their deployment.
aboutMe.line3: Thanks to my professional experience, my many personal projects and my training at Epitech, I'm now autonomous and productive enough to meet all your development needs.
aboutMe.line4: I'm used to working on small projects as well as more complex ones, implementing small functionalities as well as larger ones.
aboutMe.line5: To bring your project to life, I'll work with you to find the best technical and ergonomic solutions.
aboutMe.line6: Looking forward to working with you, don't hesitate to contact me!

descriptions.soci3ty:
Development of the landing page and dApp for The Soci3ty, a networking platform for Web3 professionals, enabling them to offer their services and expand their network.

➔ Front-End Development [Next.js + TypeScript]
descriptions.leequid:
Development of the landing page and dApp for Leequid, a liquid staking platform on the Lukso blockchain.

➔ Front-End development [Next.js + TypeScript]
  • Connections with various wallets and interactions with Smart Contracts
  • Pages: Stake | Unstake | Swap | Add & Remove liquidity
  • Claim / Auto-compound rewards
  • Statistics / Rewards analysis
  • Leequid / Lukso metrics page
descriptions.appunto:
WeDoData

Development of the “A story of Political Conflict” website, a project funded by the European Research Council (ERC), on behalf of the WeDoData agency. Visualization and comparison of French political and socio-demographic data.

➔ Front-End Development [Next.js + TypeScript]
➔ Scripts Development [Node.js + TypeScript]

Usense

Development of the mobile application for the system used by Usense, a medtech developing a medical device combined with artificial intelligence for urinary analysis, and its administrator panel.

➔ Mobile Development [React Native + TypeScript]
➔ Mobile development [Flutter]
➔ Front-End development [React.js + TypeScript]

Monuma

Complete redesign of an administrator panel. Monuma operates in the expertise, valuation and traceability of art objects, based on Blockchain technology.

➔ Front-End Development [React.js + TypeScript]

reviews.leequid:
Aurélien has incredible speed and quality of execution, and is the best front-end developer I've ever worked with.

I've had the opportunity to work with him on several projects and I'm more impressed every time. Aurélien also knows how to adapt and take on new technologies.

I highly recommend Aurélien!
reviews.appunto:
I've worked with Aurélien on several projects for my clients.

Working with Aurélien is a real pleasure. Fast and efficient, he knows how to combine a good command of technical tools with a real taste for visual aspects and product ergonomics.

He's always ready to make suggestions, and knows how to find the right solutions to the most diverse problems. Communication is always fluid, with Aurélien attentive to my requests and keen to understand the meaning of the project.

I look forward to working together again!
